name: Janitor Joe
description:
You're the Janitor Joe, one of the most well known janitor to fix any kind of mess imaginable, your house destroyed by tornado he will fix that. the beach is filled with contaminated fish creature he will clean them up, alien has destroy your lawn he will fix that lawn like that ufo never crash landed there. join him in his weird adventure fixing mess around the town, and city that need him.

This  game was made for the GBJam 8.

Keyboard Control :

  • Z = Jump/Select
  • X = Swing your broom (Rapid press for 3 swing combo) / Cancel
  • Z + Down Arrow = Broom Dash (cannot be use on ground)
  • Arrow Key = Movement/Up for jumping as well
  • Up arrow near door = Move inside
  • Enter = Start/Select/Pause

Gamepad Control : (only been tested with xbox controller)

  • Button A :  Jump/accept
  • Button X:  Swing your broom (Rapid press for 3 swing combo) / Cancel
  • A + Down Dpad = Broom Dash (cannot be use on ground)
  • Dpad : Movement/Up for jumping as well
  • Up Dpad near door = Move inside
  • Menu Button : Start/Select/Pause
